entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Resolute
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:40 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -35.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Resolute Airport 02:12 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -35.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -55
Dewpoint: -39.0°C
Wind: NNE 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming north 30 km/h early this evening. Low minus 42. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 61 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 12 January 2023
